bibl.title: Images of Alexandria in the Writings of the Second Sophistic.

series.title: Centre for Hellenic Studies. King's College London. Publications.

bibl.note: Les témoignages de: Plutarque, Dion Chrysostome, Achilles Tatius, Philostrate et Athénée.
TRAPP M.B., Images of Alexandria in the Writings of the Second Sophistic.
Anthony HIRST and Michael SILK (Edd.), Alexandria, Real and Imagined = Centre for Hellenic Studies. King's College London. Publications. 5 (Aldershot, 2004) pp. 113-132.
